resources.string: «Eh... ¿Qué es un Asalto a puesto remoto?».

El Asalto a puesto remoto es un enfrentamiento de 20 vs. 20 que se lleva a cabo en amplias islas con tres puestos remotos.\nLos jugadores compiten por capturarlos y defenderlos el mayor tiempo posible para aumentar la puntuación de su equipo.
"Wait, you're the beast that's been attacking people?"

string.speaker: Bob the Balemaw Beast - Great Cleave

resources.string: I swear, all I do is jump out at people! I haven't hurt anyone. \n\nThis all started as just a harmless bit of fun, so that people could see the myth without any danger.
"Did you know Heo Do-yun is alive?"
That man has more lives than a cat! If he survived there may yet be hope for the rest of us!
I was, along with Jasvir. I feared the worst, but if you have news, that means all is not lost.
